abilityEffect: When you play Blissey from your hand, you may flip a coin. If heads, remove 8 damage counters from Blissey. If tails, remove 4 damage counters from Blissey. Either way, if Blissey has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.

effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Paralyzed.
